meanings.definition: A thrust made in response to an attack.
meanings.sent1: The knight's quick counterthrust caught his opponent off guard.
meanings.sent2: The fencer executed a perfect counterthrust to defend himself.
meanings.sent3: The counterthrust by the ninja was so swift that it seemed like magic.
meanings.sent4: Her witty comeback was like a verbal counterthrust in the debate.
meanings.sent5: The counterthrust in the battle turned the tide in their favor.

meanings.definition: To make a thrust in response to an attack.

meanings.sent3: He decided to counterthrust playfully during their friendly sparring match.
meanings.sent4: His determination to counterthrust was like a force of nature.
meanings.sent5: The boxer's powerful counterthrust knocked out his opponent.
